item.title: Street light 2631 04 is not working and has been like this for many weeks, 27th October
item.description:
Street light 2631 04 is not working and has been like this for many weeks. Why can't someone come out and fix it. the street is dark in this spot and not safe. FIX IT PLEASE
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Shawbury Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle lane is completely closed with no alternative provision, 27th October
item.description:
The cycle is closed. This is one of the busiest dedicated cycle lanes in London. It's just closed - there is no provision for alternative routes. There is no safe way to pass. Cyclists are having to go into a very busy traffic highway. It's not obvious to anyone how to get back onto the cycle lane after the roadworks. It's dangerous!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Farringdon Street, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous junction on Belsham Street. A fatality will happen, 27th October
item.description:
This junction is extremely dangerous for cyclists. It has become a rat run for cars. Everyday are near misses as cars are going too fast as well as unable to see around the corner on Chatham Place. A compulsory stop sine should be installed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Belsham Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
